page.title: 19RECREATION IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: { OUTDOOR SPORTS.}There is a village cricket team. Many people ride & hunt; there is pony trecking, eventing & driving with pony trap. {OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES. }Pony & dog breeding, bee keeping & chicken rearing. Gardening is a favourite outdoor activity. Help is given at Riding for Disabled classes. {INDOOR SPORTS.}Darts, mostly in pubs; snooker takes place in Bramshaw village hall. {INDOOR ACTIVITIES.}Bramshaw village hall is used for old tyme dancing, yoga, bingo, flower shows & WI meetings. Family games include scrabble, monopoly, chess, draughts & crossword puzzles.
